page.syntax: User_List as C = a5ws_Get_Group_Assignments(C group_name [,* Localrequest [,L FlagWeb ]])

argument.name: User_List
argument.description: CR-LF delimited list of users by userid assigned to a particular group in the current project.

argument.name: group_name
argument.description: The name of a group in the current project.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. This variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function.

argument.name: FlagWeb
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .T. when run in the web server. .F. when run in the desktop.
.T. = Format suitable for use in a list, checkbox, or radio control on a web page
.F. = CR-LF delimited list of userid values only

page.description: Return a CR-LF delimited list of users assigned to a particular group in the current project. FlagWeb default value is .F. FlagWeb = .T. will output list in a format used in web components for checkboxes, radio buttons, list boxes and dropdowns. 'Request' pointer must be provided if run in web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_Group_Assignments() function returns a list of members of a named group. Limitations: Web applications only.

see.ref: Returns a list of members of a named group
